bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of pathological qi halting and accumulating at any place in the body. Su wen 素問 10: 有積氣在中，時害於食，名曰心痹 , “ Accumulated qi in the center. Occasionally this is harm caused by food. It is called heart blockage”.

② Pathological Condition brought forth by accumulated qi. Su wen 素問 64: 滑則病狐疝風，澀則病少 腹積氣 , “If [the vessels] are smooth, the disease is fox[-type] elevation-illness wind. If they are rough, the disease is accumulated qi in the lower abdomen”.
